works.description:
Nearly the entire metaphor list was taken from my lists on my site and placed on a single page at http://www.metaphorlist.net/

Unless in quotations, all of my examples were written by myself, as well as all of the commentary on any example. You will see that the name "G.G. Falderal" was replaced to conceal the infringement. 

I am including my metaphor examples start page and one example of one of my lists, though it appears the offender took all of the lists for his website.
